text: @JaneRuth_Aceng I really wonder why the govt and MoH can't put the appropriate measures against truck drivers... We are tired of locking down our academics, and businesses on the account of the govt importing covid19 from outside countries yet we are safe. What's wrong if you stop truck drivers?
